amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit Department of Defense funds from being used for the operation of aircraft to transport Palestinian refugees to the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mast amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 199 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mast amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 199 (Roll no. 253).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
